message: I'm feeling generous this round.  Take this 10% and we can be done with this quickly.
My turn to be generous, Alice.  Let's wrap this up - 60/40 split and we both come out ahead.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 65/35 this time.  It's a good deal for both of us, and we can avoid further inflation.
Time is running out Alice, and the money is losing value fast.  70/30 is my final offer.
Bob, we're both losing money with every round.  Let's cut our losses and split it evenly.  It's the fairest option at this point.
